wikipedia_data.title: Johann Christoph Heilbronner
biography_paragraphs: Johann Christoph Heilbronner (13 March 1706, in Ulm – 17 January 1745 (or c.1747), in Leipzig) was a German mathematical historian (Mathematikhistoriker) and theologian.
These two books are the first books that named and used the phrase "mathematical history (German: Geschichte der Mathematik, Latin: Historia matheseos)".
This article about a German mathematician is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
